description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Blaze the trail to the future! Fight for survival and aim for the role of God, The Filament! Up to four clansmen, Gunslinger, Mage, Bomber and Hero! Kill your opponent for total domination! Disarray on the battlefield is no problem for a true God! Can the world of Tungsten be yours?
description.short: Blaze the trail to the future! Fight for survival and aim for the role of God, The Filament! Up to four clansmen, Gunslinger, Mage, Bomber and Hero! Kill your opponent for total domination! Disarray on the battlefield is no problem for a true God! Can the world of Tungsten be yours?
